oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The names for August and September were given by Dia!kwain, by whom it was also stated that the names for all the months are known to the old people. In the Katkop dialect (L V.-10. 4796). 1) This story is found in Book V-10.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Moons' (months) possess their names
